Description: Body sherd of Attic pottery Gordion cup; interior: glazed black with narrow reserved band at junction with sharply tooled-off rim; exterior: reserved handle zone; lip glazed as far as preserved; black line at bottom of handle zone, glazed below; inscription in handle zone.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ5(?)
Curator's comments: The name in the signature is missing. Thickness of wall (0.2 cm) is similar to cups by Ergotimos.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B601.6.5)
Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (p. 67, no. 830, pl. XXI, no. 830)

Möller 2000 / Naukratis, Trade in Archaic Greece (p. 231, no. 9)

Smith C 1888 / Acquisitions of British Museum (p. 233, no. 13)
